title: 11/20/20 HOUR 1- Ross Tucker
itunes:title: 11/20/20 HOUR 1- Ross Tucker
description:
Ross Tucker talks to Dan about teams in Pennsylvania have to wear a mask; even while competing in athletics. The Govenor has said that the Steelers do not have an exception.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
